Can you get this for me
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

------- Original message -------
From: Ray Ormond (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov>
Date: 7/23/19 11:46 AM (EDT-05:00)
To: Lamine N'Dia (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Epstein

>>> "Ray Ormond" 07/23/2019 11:46 >>>
Lamine - The memo is very confusing. Please draft an email of his actions and current status. Also include what plans were in motion to move him to a GP unit. It will nee

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email chain with redactions. The content is related to Jeffrey Epstein and involves communication between officials at MCC New York.
